name: Tangela
author: Yukiko Baba
flavor_text: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.

attacks.name: Ingrain
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, search your deck for a {G} Energy card and attach it to Tangela. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tangela during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Tickle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
